activities:
Customers' employees' data, including employee name, business email address, and employee ID number.

In general, you can visit our public website without telling us who you are or providing any personal information about yourself. If you choose to contact us through our website to inquire about our products or services, we will use the information you provide to respond to your inquiries.

ComplianceManager provides online compliance software to authorized users of our company's customers. We contract with the companies to provide this service, and we will not use the personal information collected from the authorized users in a way different than that specified in the contract. In order to access and use the compliance software on our site, our company customers will provide us with the contact information of their authorized users, including their names and e-mail addresses at a minimum. In order to access and use the compliance software, the authorized users will log on using similar information. Depending on what our company customers need for verification, we may also collect employee or contractor numbers, titles, departments, divisions, groups and/or work telephone numbers and extensions. This information is used only to track users’ progress on assigned compliance tasks within the software and to report that information to our company's customer. Users are not asked to provide demographic information (such as income level and gender), unique identifiers (such as Social Security numbers) or other sensitive or prohibited personal data as explained in our Privacy Policy.

personaldata: Customers' employees' data, including employee name, business email address, and employee ID number.  The data is not manually processed.
recoursemech: Better Business Bureau (BBB) Swiss Safe Harbor and BBB EU Privacy Shield
